title: Accident Investigation Report - Commodore Clipper

24/2011

Summary:
MAIB report on the investigation of the fire on the main vehicle deck of Commodore Clipper while on passage to Portsmouth on 16 June 2010. Report 24/2011. Published 16 November 2011.

body:
MAIB report on the investigation of the fire on the main vehicle deck of Commodore Clipper while on passage to Portsmouth on 16 June 2010. Report 24/2011. Published 16 November 2011. 

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (6,850.22 kb) 

A Safety Flyer was also produced for this incident and can be viewed on our website:  
[Safety Flyer](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/accident_flyers/accident_flyers_2011/commodore_clipper.cfm)
